pageContext.claim: “Colombia with its new president, but unfortunately their drug business has gone up 50 percent since he's been there.”
pageContext.analysis: A UN report about Colombia found an "increase of 52 per cent in coca cultivation area - from 96,000 hectares (ha) in 2015 to 146,000 ha in 2016." That is the latest year for which UN data is available. The current president, Ivan Duque Marquez, took office in August 2018.
